amendment.description: To amend the reconciliation instructions to include instructions to the Committee on Finance to achieve the Budget's stated goal of $275 billion in mandatory health care savings.

vote.text: Amendment SA 318 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.

action.text: Amendment SA 318 proposed by Senator Crapo.
